data.text: @tykingliberties Hola Phil. In order to transfer Avios between British Airways and Iberia, both accounts must be individual, registered under the exact same personal details (name, email, postal address, etc) and have more than 3 months old. If your accounts meet all requirements, please clear/1
@louie___p Thanks, Louise. We've just replied your DMs
@mattmoorek Great Matthew, we are glad you solved it, any question, please let us know. Kind regards 😊

@mattmoorek Hola Matthew, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking details, code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@louie___p Hola Louise, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details of your situation including your booking details, code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Dieguichuu Hola Diego, sentimos leer lo que comentas, nos facilitas detalles por DM para poder ayudarte. Saludos
@HungThrottle Hola. ¿Nos podrías enviar por favor un DM con más detalles del error que presentas? Quedamos atentos. Saludos.

data.text: @Arrelocko Lucas, como te indicamos anteriormente la vía que tenemos habilitada para que te puedan ayudar con el número PIR es a través del centro de equipajes y es por vía telefónica. Lamentamos no poder indicarte algo diferente.
@Arrelocko Lucas, en este caso la vía correcta es por teléfono, ya que nuestros compañeros del centro de equipajes son los únicos que pueden ayudar a abrir el PIR.
@FranciscoLuzonG Francisco, estamos revisando tu MD. Seguiremos la conversación por esa vía. Saludos

@FranciscoLuzonG Hola, sentimos leer lo que nos comentas. Salvo error no tenemos mensajes privados tuyos con los detalles de tu caso. Quedamos atentos a tu mensaje para verificar la información disponible desde este medio si así lo deseas. Quedamos atentos a tu MD https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@reperfiled2 Lamentamos no tener actualizaciones de tu caso desde este canal; sin embargo, hemos dejado una nota interna a nuestros compañeros del departamento encargado para que nos envíen todas las novedades cuanto antes. Tan pronto tengamos respuesta, te volveremos a contactar.
@MikeTillett Hola Mike, we've just replied your DM. Since BA operates the flight and also administrates the lounge, please contact BA for further details. Kind regards

@lifezbutadream Hola, promotional upgrades, when available, are offered during the check-in or by email closer to the flight date. In some cases, there's also the option of bidding for the upgrade on the booking management page https://t.co/0Kf2bPGDPV . We remain at your disposal
@bunnynissie Hola, como hemos indicado en mensajes anteriores, el titular de la reclamación debe contactarnos directamente para poder asistirle. Gracias
@yummmclams Hola, we replied to your DM. Kind regards.
@becks_5 Hola Ian, could you send us the details of the flight please? We will check this matter. Thank you.

urls.title: ¿Conoces el alfabeto OACI? Estos son su origen y sus usos
urls.description: El alfabeto OACI tiene una curiosa historia que comienza hace casi un siglo y que se retoma tras la II Guerra Mundial. Conócela.

data.text: Discover the ICAO alphabet and use the code to spell your name👉https://t.co/61EUwVlHg4 ✈️ (3/3)
That's how the ICAO alphabet works. A language to clarify international aviation messages by replacing letters with: 🔤 (2/3)
Ever heard the words "Alfa, Bravo, Charlie" or something like that while watching a movie? 💬 If so, listen up 👀 (1/3)
@DamsTweets Hola Damián, we are sorry to hear this, could you send us all the details by DM please? Thank you.
@ca10024947 Hola Elena. We have replied to your DM's. Please read our comments. Regards.
@FPLUnhinged Hola. Further details can be read here: https://t.co/8GNlN44SsJ. If you need any other information, please let us know. Regards,
@rosieb8888 Sorry to read this, Rosie. Please check our new DM

@lpuerto Hola Luis, sorry for the inconvenience. Notice that this isn't exactly a marketing email, it's the announcement about the change on the Iberia Plus Avios earning system. It has been sent to all Iberia Plus members. Kind regards

@NatashaHallam11 Sorry, Natasha. When we asked if you had any invoice related to a first necessity expense, you said that you didn't have and you wanted compensation, which doesn't apply in your case. We're only able to refund first necessity expenses and, for so, we need the invoice
@eladgaf Hola Ela, hemos respondido tu mensaje directo, saludos.
@NatashaHallam11 Hola Natasha, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with a copy of the receipt/invoice related to the taxi ride https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@H10HCL Hola Harry, sorry to read this. If we are the flight operator, please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and the reference number of the seat payment (07555...) https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@fomoandfud Hola Dillon, hemos respondido a tus otros mensajes, esperamos tu información, así mismo te sugerimos no hacer flooding, ya que tus mensajes podrían borrarse por políticas de la red. Gracias de antemano.
@fomoandfud Hola Dillon, esperamos tu información por DM. Saludos.
@fomoandfud Hola Dillon, ¿nos podrías dar detalles del vuelo del que nos comentas por DM? Gracias.
@DrKBSalc Hola Katie, please send us a DM (https://t.co/SlkDOVtS3J more details about your inquiry in a so we can help you from this channel. We remain at your disposal, regards.
@neilpos Thank you Neil, in this case we suggest you to check constantly our website and follow us in all our social networks to know all the updates of the route that you indicate us.

data.text: @neilpos Hola Neil, we have checked and see the flight you indicate us. From LGW to LCG operated by Vueling. We suggest you expand the date range to find more options. Kind regards.

@miamaestro Hola Mia, sentimos las molestias ocasionadas. Amablemente te pedimos que nos envíes un mensaje directo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 con todos los detalles del incidente con tu equipaje para revisar desde este departamento, estaremos a la espera de la información, saludos.

@j_segall Hola Jorge, sentimos leer tu comentario. Agradeceremos que puedas compartirnos todos los detalles a través de un mensaje directo https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE y si hay algo en lo que podamos ayudarte desde aquí, déjanos saber. Saludos.
@elwatto Sorry for the inconvenience. Another option is to clear all cookies from the browser's memory cache or try again with a different browser or device.

@CHRISTICO8 Hola, sentimos leer tu comentario. Si tuviste algún inconveniente con tu vuelo o reserva, agradeceremos que puedas indicarnos los detalles a través de un mensaje directo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6. Saludos.

📣 We are starting a new season with great enthusiasm and, in the first quarter of 2023, we will grow with the arrival of new aircraft. 

All the information 👇 
https://t.co/wKWrTxA3m4
@eladgaf Gracias por confirmarnos, Ela. Revisamos tus mensajes, saludos.
@eladgaf Ela, te hemos solicitado información adicional por nuestra conversación privada. Estaremos a la espera por esa vía, saludos.
@eladgaf Hola ela, procedemos a revisar tus mensajes y dar respuesta a los mismos, saludos.
@eeeeebcux If you wish to register the complaint, you can use the online form. However, the claims department isn't able to speed up the chargeback verification process

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @eeeeebcux Sorry for the delay. The complaints form (https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG) is only for past flight experiences. Using it to complaint about the team responsible for the chargebacks won't speed up your request, unfortunately. Apologies
@BisonInTexas Thanks :)
@BisonInTexas Hola Craig, please send us a DM with your booking code and last name, we will gladly help you. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@jonnysmorrison Hola Jonny, could you tell us where do you need to access to check it? You can send us the details by DM. Thank you.
@eeeeebcux Hola, we will follow your case replying to your DM. Regards.
@yassndiaye Hola Yacine, we received your DM and sent you a message. Thank you.
@MrAlford14 Hola Alfy, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM requesting your claim details, we'll await for your response through that channel. Regards

@elwatto Hola Miguel, we are sorry for the inconvenience, you can let the birth date 01 as default and continue with the purchase process, and after you can enter to manage my booking and update all your personal information. Kind regards

@ChrisWallraff Hola Orozco, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM all details of your situation including booking code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

data.text: @stratfordjones Hola, we have sent a response to your other tweet requesting some details to be able to verify the information in your case. Regards.
@stratfordjones Hola, pelase send us more details about your case via DM. So we can verify all the information from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@MrToad_88 Hola Sean, please send us a direct message with more information so that we can follow up on your case from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@oddjobjoeglenn Hola Joseph, could you send us all your contact details and the luggage tag by DM? Thank you.

urls.title: Oficinas de Iberia - Iberia
urls.description: Estamos a tu disposición en nuestra amplia red de oficinas.

data.text: @Arrelocko Hola Lucas, en este caso entendemos que no tienes un PIR, este siendo el caso te sugerimos comunicarte con el departamento de equipaje para que te puedan indicar como proceder, saludos. https://t.co/EXxpJODerL
@AseanyDuncan Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@susanavalle_ Hola, could you send us the details of your booking by DM? We will gladly help you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@NoOtherDakota05 Hola Tammy, in our private conversation we have indicated how to proceed. Please let us know by that means if you have initiated a claim through our web form. We will be waiting, regards.
@QuantumAlpha01 Hola, we're very sorry for the late reply, please check the DM we sent you. Kind regards.

@castbilingual Hola Angela, we're very sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with all the details of your case and the incident that ocurred so we can assist you. Best regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@castro__c Hola, we're very sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with more details on the incident that ocurred so we can have a look and assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

📢 Notice to passengers: we remind you that during the early hours of this Sunday, 30 October, the time will change: at 3AM it will return to 2AM 🕐 Attention! What does not change is the time of your flight, which is the one on your ticket. #TimeChange https://t.co/W7MD9RMC3s

urls.title: Reclamaciones sobre el servicio - Iberia
urls.description: En nuestro centro de atención al cliente disponemos de un servicio de reclamaciones Iberia en el que responderemos a todas tus quejas y sugerencias

data.text: @jessicatanoe Jessica, in this case you should ask for the refund at the claim form https://t.co/waZL0xzxKK; as soon as our colleagues verified your case they will contact you with the options you have. We remain at your disposal, kind regards.

@QuantumAlpha01 Hola, we are going to help you from this channel; please send us a DM (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) with your booking and ticket number (075****) so we can verify. We remain at your disposal, regards.
@coley_quiana Coley, we have replied your DM. We will continue the conversation there.
@coley_quiana Hola Coley, we are sorry to hear this. Please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with more details of what happened. We remain at your disposal, regards.

@nakitosh1 In addition, for your safety, we would like to share with you that we have filters in our cabins that eliminate 99.7% of viruses and bacteria and keep the air clean. We appreciate the comments you share with us and remain at your disposal.
/2
@nakitosh1 Hola Nakitosh, we can assure you that safety is our priority. We comply with the safety measures recommended by the authorities of each country.  /1
@kjmomof3 Hola Kelly, did you have luggage incident open with us? Please let us know more details please. Regards

@katecks Hola Catherine, please send us more details in a DM. If you proceed through our web form, please send us the file number generated so that we can verify the details from here.  Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@A43531 We have escalated your case with the corresponding department, we will inform you as soon as we have an answer. Best regards.

@A43531 That's not our intention at all. That's why we offered you a voucher extension via DM, but it cannot be for one year more. Your vouchers will expire on november 13 for purchases, and the last flight must be taken before May 13 2023. We remain at your disposal

@A43531 Sorry for the inconvenience. We can see our colleagues are working on the claim submitted on September 30 and you will receive an answer by email shortly. Due to the high volume of request, our colleagues are taking longer than the usual 7 business days to reply. Apologies
@A43531 Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, we're not able to provide a different answer than the one given on our DMs. Apologies
@FansonBrooke Hola, we're sorry to read this and have just replied to your DMs. Please check

@howardrpets Hola Howard, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your booking details, code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@A43531 Hola, we are sorry for the inconvenience, we have replied your DM, we'll continue through that channel. Regards

@chloregy Hola Divino, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details of your situation including your booking confirmation, code, ticket number and registered email? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Kryst33 Hola Kris, send us a direct message https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 with all the details about your comment so we can help you. Kind regards.
@syb007 Hola, we have responded to your direct messages. We would appreciate continuing the conversation in that way. Kind regards.
@BuckeyeTap Hola. We have replied to your direct message. Please read our comments. Regards.
@kadielicious Hola. We have replied to your direct message. Please read our comments. Regards.
@RickF645 Hola Rick, we're sorry to read this. May we assist you with a specific query? If so, please send us a DM with more details https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@hmruskin Hola Harriet, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@reperfiled2 Mike, lamentamos no tener actualizaciones por parte del departamento encargado; tan pronto tengamos respuesta por parte de ellos, te volveremos a contactar.
@AndersBrlin You're welcome Anders :)

urls.title: Travel restrictions due to COVID-19

data.text: @lifezbutadream Hola, thank you for contacting us, you can verify entry and exit country requirements through this link: https://t.co/tAXgHHuDbg , Any question, please let us know by DM. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

data.text: @AndersBrlin Hola Anders, please clear all cookies from the browser's memory cache or try again with a different browser or device: https://t.co/m6fyDz8alC

@hegarty_deirdre Thank you for the information Deirdre, could you please give us all details of your booking by DM including, code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance

@hegarty_deirdre Hola Deirdre, thank you for contacting us , could your friend contact us directly by DM through her own social media profile in order to help her? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@kungfuwolfduck Hola Jasmin, we are sorry to read this, could you please tell us by DM all details of your situation ? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@drgrajedam Hola, sentimos leer tu comentario y lo sucedido. Esperamos que nuestros compañeros tengan novedades cuanto antes y puedan contactarte. Gracias. Un saludo
